doc.title: 3's a Crowd
doc.plot: "Who knows a man better his wife or his secretary?" This Chuck Barris game show sought to resolve the age-old question. Points were awarded based on how a male contestant's wife and secretary answered (usually risque) questions. The winning team either the wives or the secretaries split a $1,000 cash prize.
